title: Noragami Aragoto
synopsis: Yato and Yukine have finally mended their relationship as god and Regalia, and everyone has returned to their daily life. Yato remains a minor and unknown deity who continues taking odd jobs for five yen apiece in the hopes of one day having millions of worshippers and his own grand shrine. Hiyori Iki has yet to have her loose soul fixed by Yato, but she enjoys life and prepares to attend high school nonetheless.
voices: ['Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Uchida, Maaya', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Toyosaki, Aki', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Okiayu, Ryoutarou', 'Ono, Daisuke', 'Ishikawa, Kaito']
